scripts.generate-images: npm run generate-thumb && npm run generate-webp
scripts.generate-thumb: rm -rf ./images/gallery/thumb && mkdir ./images/gallery/thumb && cd ./images/gallery/full && for i in *.jpg; do convert -thumbnail 500 $i ../thumb/$i; done;
scripts.generate-webp: npm run generate-webp:full && npm run generate-webp:thumb
